text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 67 DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN 11.74 As a minimum, utilities statements should include: z  location and size of existing utilities and services; z  proposed connection points routes to/from the site and site entry points; z  equipment required on and off-site to allow the connection; z  water, electricity and energy supplies, drainage and digital connections; z other relevant reports and provide overview of key information, such as the drainage strategy; z  connection sizes, peak loads, annual demands, volumes, capacities as required for applications with each provider; z  function, operation and key maintenance of each item; z  a programme for works; and z  construction and occupation including phasing where applicable.
